condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Al 2025, las autoridades nacionales y provinciales aumentan sus capacidades para favorecer la inversion publica en politicassectoriales e intersectoriales destinadas a la ni?ez y la adolescencia con especial enfasis en aquellos en situacion de pobreza,exclusion y vulnerabilidad

description.narrative: UNICEF&39;s advocacy, technical and financial cooperation generated important results with the National Ministry of Economy (MoE) to advance the institutionalization of Public Finance for Children (PF4C). These favored key evidence generation on investment gaps, promoted meaningful budget debate, guided policy decisions, and protected budget for children in the COVID-19 policy response and economic recovery context. UNICEF’s work contributed to identify the economic impacts of COVID-19 on households with children and national government’s fiscal efforts to mitigate them. It also favored a significant expansion in coverage and value of the main national food policy directed to the most disadvantaged families. | Status:Met | As-of Date:14/01/2022

title.narrative: Strengthened capacity of stakeholders in budgeting at all levels of government to improve spending outcomes for children, Text

baseline.value: 1 instancia de participacion formal legislativa en el ciclo de discusion presupuestaria; 3 instancias de participacion e intercambio en ambitos de dialogo con academia, sociedad civil y gobiernos.

target.value: 2025:Serie completa de instancis de dialogo con el ejecutivo, el legislativo, la sociedad civil y la academia y otros paises, desde el 2021 hasta el 2025

actual.value: 2021:1 instancia de participacion formal legislativa en el ciclo de discusion presupuestaria; 3 instancias de participacion e intercambio en ambitos de dialogo con academia, sociedad civil y gobiernos.
